channel.title: Movember on { jessecanderson.dev }
channel.description: Recent content in Movember on { jessecanderson.dev }

item.title: Movember 2016
item.description: This post will be pretty short I think. I just wanted to touch upon Movember for mens health. For the last three years I have participated in Movember to help raise awareness for mens health. The first year, it was really just a reason to grow a moustache really. I didn’t take the cause very seriously and didn’t appreciate what the group was really trying to do. There are a few movements in November and I admit that I got caught up in the “everyone is doing it” thing.
